hero.ariaLabel: Image of a person sitting on the floor with their back on a couch while using a laptop to study. Photo by Thought Catalog on Unsplash

header.title: Quick, Easy, Study in a Flash!
header.copy: Create personalized flashcards and study them online, anytime, anywhere.

img.alt: Image of a person studying using a laptop. Photo by Kojo Kwarteng on Unsplash
img.caption: Create your own flashcards

content.title: Studying Made Easy
content.copy: FlashLearn lets you create personalized flashcards in minutes, so you can focus on what matters most—studying. Sign up for free and start your study journey today!

img.alt: Image of a person studying using a laptop. Photo by Anete Lūsiņa on Unsplash
img.caption: Save time studying

content.title: Save Time
content.copy: Stop wasting time writing out flashcards by hand. With FlashLearn, you can create, organize, and review your study material in less time, leaving you more hours to focus on learning.

hero.ariaLabel: Dashboard Page Header. This section contains the title and description. The background image is of a person with a black shirt studying. Photo by Anthony Riera on Unsplash.

header.title: Dashboard
header.copy: Welcome to your dashboard. Here you can view your card sets, create new ones, and study them. To get started create a Set.

hero.ariaLabel: Set Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the set page. The background image is of a person with red hair studying, while facing forward and looking towards the camera. Photo by ThisisEngineering RAEng on Unsplash.

header.title: Set
header.copy: Welcome to your set. Here you can view your flashcards, create new ones, and study them.

hero.ariaLabel: Create Set Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the set page. The background image is of a person sits on padded chair while using MacBook during daytime. Photo by Christina @ wocintechchat on Unsplash.

header.title: Create Set
header.copy: Create a new set of flashcards. Add a title and description to get started.

hero.ariaLabel: Edit Set Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the set page. The background image is of a person sits on padded chair while using MacBook during daytime. Photo by Christina @ wocintechchat on Unsplash.

header.title: Edit Set
header.copy: Edit your set of flashcards. Add a title and description to get started.

hero.ariaLabel: Add Card Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the add card page. The background image is of a person in black crew neck shirt using Macbook. Photo by Lala Azizli on Unsplash.

header.title: Add Card
header.copy: Create a new flashcard. Add a question and answer to get started.

hero.ariaLabel: Edit Card Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the edit card page. The background image is of a person in black crew neck shirt using Macbook. Photo by Lala Azizli on Unsplash.

header.title: Edit Card
header.copy: Edit your flashcard. Add a question and answer to get started.

hero.ariaLabel: View Cards Page Header. This section contains the title, description, and actions for the view card page. The background image is of a Young person reads poetry book. Photo by Thought Catalog on Unsplash.

header.title: View Cards
header.copy: View your flashcard. Add a question and answer to get started.
